data.title: Just Average - Limited Hours
data.text: Had the Sloppy Joe.  It was a bit on the "plain" side.  The rest of the family had an assortment of sandwiches and none seemed to excited about them.  They are not open very much - limited to weekends it seems?  Stop in for an ice cream or a sandwich, and you might like it!

data.title: Fun, fifties vibe
data.text: I love taking my kids for ice cream to this restaurant.  The fifties vibe is so much fun... juke box, hula hoops, checkered floors.  The staff is always very friendly.

data.title: IQ above 84 not a requirement
data.text:
Phosphates are terriable. Lacking flavor and sugar. Tasts like alkaseltzer.
Buisness half way clean and in poor repair. Girl behind the counter couldn't find her own behind even if she used both hands.
Chicago dog was ok.

data.title: Fun atmosphere.
data.text: My kids love coming here for ice cream. The other food is decent as well. It's a fun place with a 50's vibe. I only wish the hours weren't so hit and miss.

data.title: Poor Business Ethics
data.text: I want to start by saying my most recent visit was not my 1st visit, but it will be my last. We had purchased a Milwaukee Perk deal a  few months back but really only went to DT Waukesha on Friday nights when you couldn't use the deal. We went several times during the week that the deal expired and they were closed on every attempt. I emailed the manager with my concerns with no reply. We were downtown for small business Sat and they were open. When we discussed the deal they said they "couldn't" accept the offer even for what we had ready paid. We walked out and will not return.
